languages.text: "Мы провинились? Ошиблись?" {n}Напряженные шепоты служителей культа заполняют залу.{/n} "Как нам отныне служить Ему? Как?.."

"Have we transgressed? Have we caused offence?" {n}The worried cultists whisper among themselves and the sound of their anxious voices fills the hall.{/n} "What will we do now? What service can we offer Him?"
languages.original_text: "Мы провинились? Ошиблись?" {n}Напряженные шепоты служителей культа заполняют залу.{/n} "Как нам отныне служить Ему? Как?.."

traits.locale_text: "Have we transgressed? Have we erred?" {n}The cultists' tense whispers fill the hall.{/n} "How are we to serve Him from now on? How?"
"Have we transgressed? Have we erred?" {n}The cultists' tense whispers fill the hall.{/n} "How are we to serve Him from now on? How?"

"Have we transgressed? Have we caused offense?" {n}The worried cultists whisper among themselves and the sound of their anxious voices fills the hall.{/n} "What will we do now? What service can we offer Him?"

"Have we transgressed? Have we caused offense?" {n}The worried cultists whisper among themselves and the sound of their anxious voices fills the hall.{/n} "What will we do now? What service can we offer Him?"

"Have we transgressed? Have we caused offence?" {n}The worried cultists whisper among themselves and the sound of their anxious voices fills the hall.{/n} "What will we do now? What service can we offer Him?"

"Have we transgressed? Have we caused offence?" {n}The worried cultists whisper among themselves and the sound of their anxious voices fills the hall.{/n} "What will we do now? What service can we offer Him?"

languages.text: « Aurions-nous transgressé ? Aurions-nous causé quelque offense ? » {n}Les murmures inquiets des cultistes résonnent dans le hall.{/n} « Qu'allons-nous faire, à présent ? Quel service pouvons-nous Lui offrir ? »
languages.original_text: "Have we transgressed? Have we caused offence?" {n}The worried cultists whisper among themselves and the sound of their anxious voices fills the hall.{/n} "What will we do now? What service can we offer Him?"

traits.locale_text: « Aurions-nous transgressé ? Aurions-nous causé quelque offense ? » {n}Les murmures inquiets des cultistes résonnent dans le hall.{/n} « Qu'allons-nous faire, à présent ? Quel service pouvons-nous Lui offrir ? »

languages.text: «¿Hemos cometido algún error? ¿Hemos causado alguna ofensa?». {n}Los cultistas susurran entre ellos con preocupación, y sus voces inquietas llenan la sala.{/n} «¿Qué haremos ahora? ¿Qué servicio podemos ofrecer?».
languages.original_text: "Have we transgressed? Have we caused offence?" {n}The worried cultists whisper among themselves and the sound of their anxious voices fills the hall.{/n} "What will we do now? What service can we offer Him?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Hemos cometido algún error? ¿Hemos causado alguna ofensa?». {n}Los cultistas susurran entre ellos con preocupación, y sus voces inquietas llenan la sala.{/n} «¿Qué haremos ahora? ¿Qué servicio podemos ofrecer?».

languages.text: “是我们僭越了吗？是我们冒犯大人了吗？”{n}忧心忡忡的信徒们窃窃私语着，焦虑的声音充满了整个大厅。{/n}“我们现在该怎么办？我们该怎么侍奉不死之神？”
languages.original_text: "Have we transgressed? Have we caused offence?" {n}The worried cultists whisper among themselves and the sound of their anxious voices fills the hall.{/n} "What will we do now? What service can we offer Him?"

traits.locale_text: “是我们僭越了吗？是我们冒犯大人了吗？”{n}忧心忡忡的信徒们窃窃私语着，焦虑的声音充满了整个大厅。{/n}“我们现在该怎么办？我们该怎么侍奉不死之神？”

languages.text: 「罪を犯しましたか？不快な思いをさせてしまいましたか？」{n}心配そうな魔女団員たちがささやき合い、不安げな声がホールに響いた。{/n}「これからどうしましょう？主にどんな奉仕ができるのでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "Have we transgressed? Have we caused offence?" {n}The worried cultists whisper among themselves and the sound of their anxious voices fills the hall.{/n} "What will we do now? What service can we offer Him?"

traits.locale_text: 「罪を犯しましたか？不快な思いをさせてしまいましたか？」{n}心配そうな魔女団員たちがささやき合い、不安げな声がホールに響いた。{/n}「これからどうしましょう？主にどんな奉仕ができるのでしょう？」

languages.text: "Haben wir einen Verstoß begangen? Haben wir jemanden verärgert?"{n}, wispern die besorgten Kultisten untereinander, und der Klang ihrer unruhigen Stimmen füllt den Raum.{/n} "Was werden wir nun tun? Welchen Dienst können wir ihm anbieten?"
languages.original_text: "Have we transgressed? Have we caused offence?" {n}The worried cultists whisper among themselves and the sound of their anxious voices fills the hall.{/n} "What will we do now? What service can we offer Him?"

traits.locale_text: "Haben wir einen Verstoß begangen? Haben wir jemanden verärgert?"{n}, wispern die besorgten Kultisten untereinander, und der Klang ihrer unruhigen Stimmen füllt den Raum.{/n} "Was werden wir nun tun? Welchen Dienst können wir ihm anbieten?"

languages.original_text: "Have we transgressed? Have we caused offence?" {n}The worried cultists whisper among themselves and the sound of their anxious voices fills the hall.{/n} "What will we do now? What service can we offer Him?"

languages.text: "Bir günah mı işledik? Bir ayıbımız mı oldu?" {n}Endişeli tarikatçılar kendi aralarında fısıldadıkça endişeli sesleri salonu dolduruyor.{/n} "Ya şimdi ne yapacağız? O'na ne hizmetimiz olabilir?"
languages.original_text: "Have we transgressed? Have we caused offence?" {n}The worried cultists whisper among themselves and the sound of their anxious voices fills the hall.{/n} "What will we do now? What service can we offer Him?"
